name: Linxa
overview:
Linxa is a privately held company located in Istanbul, Turkey that provides innovative voice and data traffic solutions to telecom carriers and operators. Linxa enables telecom companies to manage every aspect of their wholesale processes through a single interface.

Along with the increasing competition in the wholesale voice and data markets, telecom companies strive to implement new procedures to gain a competitive advantage. Linxa helps its customers achieve their goals by significantly increasing their quality, efficiency and profitability.

Linxa Connect consists of three different modules that manage different wholesale processes.

Linxa Rates simplifies the manual rate sheet management process. Linxa Rates automatically recognizes and converts different types of rate sheets to allow users to import detailed rate information to their systems and perform detailed analysis.

Linxa Route automatically generates and manages routing plans. Linxa Route implements multiple user inputs for different criteria to create optimum routing plans and continuously monitors the network to improve performance.

Linxa Bill provides comprehensive financial management of the interconnect business. Linxa Bill automatically generates invoices and facilitates dispute settlement with interconnect business partners.
